name: World eSports
overview:
World eSports, LLC’s goal to enhance the competitive online gaming community in North America and abroad by being the premier, comprehensive resource on the Internet and at Local Area Network events for electronic sports.

World eSports, LLC will accomplish this by:

-First providing a quality online community to interact and compete. -Developing a robust anti-cheat software. -Building an intercollegiate competition system. -Hosting major events for gamers to come together and showcase their gaming skills.

Bringing Gaming to Gamers: World eSports, LLC is proud to provide video gamers quality arenas worldwide with which to interact and show off their gaming skills with their fellow gamers. WeS will work with other companies to make electronic gaming competitions better using feedback from our gaming communities. To do this WeS will always be on the look out for new and up coming companies to partner with and develop a strong relationships to better the competitive gaming experience whether online or at local area network events.

Building Communication: World eSports, LLC will work to make the fundamental building blocks of electronic sports development more solid starting with communication. Communication is one of the strongest ways to improve what WeS has to offer and better the eSports community as a whole. WeS will form strategic partnerships and relationships with individuals, companies, and gaming communities to establish a solid network for expediting eSports collaboration to better competitions and grow the eSports scene. WeS will constantly look at current and future electronic sports to make a world wide eSports community come true.

Future of electronic sports: World eSports. LLC will become a major contributor to the development of electronic sports to ensure that the game developers embrace the competition side of their games and not only cater to casual gamers. WeS will be working with developers, mod developers, and anti-cheat developers on new ideas and provide strategic research through our gaming communities from our various projects. WeS will become one of the strongest electronic sport companies to help build the future of competitive gaming.
